name: Break In (itch) (dylanoonk)
description:
BETA v1.0

Controls: WASD / Arrow Keys - Move Around Space - Open Console ESC - Close Console / Close Password Dialog Tab - Open Inventory / Close Inventory Enter - Close Dialog / Submit Password

This is a game that attempts to educate players on cyber security. Most people are often told rules about internet safety, but they've never been told why. This game teaches players why we need strong passwords and how to identify phishing attacks in a fun/easy-to-consume manner.
